# state

**Instance Property**

The collection of equipment states.

## Declaration

```swift
var state: EquipmentStateCollection
```

## Getting collection properties

- **count**: The number of equipment items in this collection.
- **ids**: The identifiers of all the equipment in this collection.

items.description: The number of equipment items in this collection.
